Name: The Guard
About the game: You are on the night shift at the mall. While you were taking over, your partner went missing. You hear noises all the time. You need to find out what they are and find your partner. As you pass, you will need to find the keys and open locked rooms. First person game with horror elements. Explore the mall and its rooms, collect batteries for your flashlight. Darkness can conceal a variety of mysteries. F - flashlight, Tab - inventory Control in the game WASD - move, left mouse button - pick up the item. Right mouse button - examine the item. Features: - pleasant graphics; - simple controls; - interesting gameplay;
